Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Billing Customer}},
Thank you for registering for the April 16-17, 2013 Billing Software Group Training in Madison, WI. If you selected credit card payment, a TriTech representative will contact you for your payment information. The $500 fee can be paid via check or credit card.
The training will be held at the HotelRED Regent Room - 1501 Monroe St, Madison, WI 53711
If you need a hotel room, we recommend the following: HotelRED <http://www.hotelred.com/>: 1501 Monroe St, Madison, WI 53711 Phone: 608-819-8228 Block of rooms held under "Ryan Brothers" at rate of $109 per night plus tax, which will be held until March 15, 2013

If you have questions or if there is anything we can do to make this a better experience for you, please contact us:
Patrick Ryan, Ryan Brothers Ambulance Service 608-310-7922 or pryan@ryanbros.net
Tyler Harman, TriTech Software Systems 800-537-3927 ext 4830 or Tyler.Harman@tritech.com
Here is a link <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/_UG/Sample_2-day_Group_Training_agenda.pdf> to download a sample copy of the agenda.
Registration will begin on the first day at 7:45 a.m. We sincerely hope that these two days of education will allow everyone to gain knowledge in the areas desired.
We invite you to dress casually and comfortably for the session. Since room temperatures and preferences vary from person to person, please bring a sweater or sweatshirt to wear if needed.
See you in April!
